doc.title: Girls
doc.plot: Alex, the jaded, wealthy protagonist, has spent a lifetime battling other men for money and status in the cutthroat business world. Having sold his soul for the kind of success that spells easy access to women, particularly young women - dewy - often underage-strippers, prostitutes, club kids, daughters' friends, friends' daughters and miscellaneous nymphets - eager to have their innocence despoiled by middle-aged men with sports cars and Cuban cigars. But his world comes crashing down when he sleeps his with his partners daughter in St. Bart's, causing his world to spiral out of control and forcing him to confront the emphasis and meaning or lack thereof the life he's living.
